It may help to remind yourself of how much your partner means to you, and how hurt they would be if they found out you were being un faithful.

Ultimately, cheating can cause immense pain and destruction in relationships—and it should always be avoided. Instead of justifying your actions, remember that it's always best to prioritize honesty and integrity in relationships.
